notes: This data includes migrant remittance outflows (US$ million)  from 1993 to 2012.  In which, migrant remittance outflow  is estimated by worker's remittance, compensation of employee and migrant transfer credit (US$ million). The data is extracted from from http://econ.worldbank.org/WBSITE/EXTERNAL/EXTDEC/EXTDECPROSPECTS/0,,cont...
